name: Segah A. Mir
description:
Consulted a wide variety of companies, of various sizes, such as: Duetto Research (2013), Earnest (2014), Strava (2014), Docker (2016), Digital Ocean (2016), RealSelf (2017), Procore (2017), and others. Former Looker employee.

What is unique about having had access to data within so many companies is that Segah can tell a lot about organizations just by looking at their data.

payments.name: PaymentsBI Consulting
payments.description: Boutique services in Big Data Analytics in Payments and FinTech
